channel.title: QA on Randy Griffin
channel.description: Recent content in QA on Randy Griffin

item.title: Project 3: UI Automation
item.description: Developed a hybrid test framework using Selenium and Java for browser automation Increased Java End-To-End test code coverage to 80% Performed Regression testing after releasing new features Created automated script for REST API testing using Rest Assured framework. Tracked and reported bugs using Jira Link to Github Repository
